HIRING for "Department Manager" -Smart Bazaar We are looking for a dynamic professional with excellent communication skills and in-depth experience in back-end & front-end retail operations. Preferred Industry:  Retail, QSR and FMCG/Hospitality Key Responsibilities : #Execute retail operations in the store and ensure adherence to all standard operating procedures of the company. #Lead, mentor and motivate a team of associates to deliver reliable services to Customers, other colleagues. #Ensure that business strategies are implemented in the assigned store. #Manage and execute product promotion. Exceed sales and customer satisfaction objectives. #Manage Dump & Shrink in the store Willing to relocate  Ahmedabad, Jamnagar, Anand, Vadodara, Surat, Himmatnagar Note:- Candidate must have relevant experience min 3+ Years with Retail/QSR/Hospitality. Candidates should be ready to relocate anywhere in Gujarat    including Tier 3-4 cities . column2: Job description Are you a fashion expert passionate about helping businesses enhance their brand image? Then, were looking for you! We seek a skilled and experienced fashion consultant to join our team and provide tailored fashion solutions and sales to our B2C. As a fashion consultant in our B2C division, you will play a crucial role in assisting businesses in aligning their visual identity with the latest fashion trends and creating a powerful brand presence in the competitive market. You will be helping companies create a visually appealing and brand-aligned wardrobe and contribute to enhancing their overall brand image and customer perception. You will provide expert advice on selecting appropriate clothing, accessories, and uniforms that align with each business's unique brand identity and industry standards. We value innovation, creativity and a deep understanding of fashion as essential qualities in our fashion consultants. Join our team of passionate fashion consultants and be part of transforming our B2C clients' fashion choices, elevating their brand presence, and helping them stand out in today's competitive market. We offer a dynamic and collaborative work environment where you will have the chance to work with a range of clients and make a lasting impact on their brand identity. We provide competitive compensation, health benefits, and opportunities for career advancement. Objectives of this role Retail managers are responsible for every aspect of the day-to-day supervision of retail outlets, including sales, staff, stock and resources management. A retail managers role is to run a store successfully. Working on the shop floor, they are in constant contact with their customers and staff. They are responsible for ensuring their staff give great customer service as well as monitoring the financial performance of the store. Typical responsibilities of the job include: Recruiting, training, supervising and appraising staff Managing budgets Maintaining statistical and financial records Dealing with customer queries and complaints Overseeing pricing and stock control Maximizing profitability and setting/meeting sales targets, including motivating staff to do so Ensuring compliance with health and safety legislation Preparing promotional materials and displays Liaising with head office. Required skills and qualifications Bachelors degree is must. Proven experience in fashion retail outlet Sales. Extensive knowledge of fashion trends, industry standards, and brand representation. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills to collaborate effectively with B2C clients. Strong analytical abilities to assess clients' fashion needs and provide tailored recommendations. Creative thinking and the ability to develop unique fashion strategies that align with brand identities. Required Candidate profile Candidate must have experience in retail (MOST ADDED ADVANTAGES) Retail /Apparel must Must be Graduate Exp-2 to 5 Years Experience:  3 to 7 years Annual CTC:  Rupees 2,50,000 to 3,75,000 Share your resume to the following Email Id Kumaraguru.D@ril.com

column2: This role is responsible to meet or exceed Retail Sales, KPIs, Comp Growth against planned Budgets for both Company Own Stores and Franchisee run Mono brand Stores       This person will also be responsible to drive commercial success, to strengthen retail execution in the assigned stores and to drive partner s profitability                      Key Responsibilities                     To ensure proper execution of established policies, procedure, initiatives and directives regarding store operation, visual merchandizing, staff training and in-store marketing store activation                     Manage store PL and drive profitability for      own stores and partner     through retail excellence.                     To support front Retail forces via Store operation excellence programs to ensure increasing stores productivity and profitability                     To ensure all stores comply Global VM standard and guideline                     Identify and communicate Market needs and best practices                     To drive the      DTC OPS MANAGERS     to visit Own Franchise stores and to ensure productivity, Retail KPIs, VM, Re-order enforcement, etc                     To provide realistic plans and forecasts on store performances                     Retail Sales, KPIs, Comp Growth of the Cluster against planned Budgets of Franchisee run Mono brand stores                     Store Operations Excellence: Store Audits                     Managing staff motivation/incentives and productivity (Comp growth in staff productivity - avg sales / month/year)                     Engagement of store team and developing Retail mindset of the Franchisee Partners                     Driving best practices into the stores in coordination with VM/Merchandising and the COE teams                     Closely liaison with the training team to deliver world class service experience in the stores responsible                       Franchise KAM                       To ensure recommended buy plan for assigned partners is met as per budgets.                     Ensure execution of the pre orders is done as per plan.                     To drive Franchisee Performance by setting objectives, strategies, tactics, allocate resources and ensure translation into action plans respecting the framework set by the customer portfolio strategies                     COURAGE:    Speak up when you see an opportunity; step up when you see a need..           OWNERSHIP:    Pick up the ball. Be proactive, take responsibility and follow-through.           INNOVATION:    Elevate to win. Be curious, test and learn new and better ways of doing things.           TEAMPLAY:    Win together. Work collaboratively and cultivate a shared mindset.           INTEGRITY:    Play by the rules. Hold yourself and others accountable to our company s standards.           RESPECT:    Value all players. Display empathy, be inclusive and show dignity to all.

column2: 1. Is responsible for Pre-opening procedures- Opens Store in the morning, monitoing Store. 2. Morning inspection with Manager - Operations, discuss sales and set targets for the day.  3. Sales figures of previous day. Discuss with Staff, inform days budget.  4. Open cash point to start operations for the day - and ensure that float is entered in all operating tills on time.  5. Ensure that tills are manned - Allocation of dedicated cashiers.  6. Alternative arrangements for staff that are sick/absent.  7. Detailed Floor inspection.  8. Determine best sellers and poor sellers and derive upon a plan of action. 9. To plan layouts depending on new lines and seasons.  10. To ensure that stock is well presented and displayed.  11. Ensure that replenishment takes place regularly whenever required.  12. To plan moves on a daily and weekly basis depending on stock and new lines.  13. Ensure that proper care is taken while making 'Moves' within the Department.  14. Ensure that mannequins are changed regularly and that merchandise is displayed neatly on them.  15. Is present to receive deliveries and assists his colleagues and staff in doing so.  16. Getting the deliveries checked and counted in a systematic manner.  17. Send the appropriate stock to their respective Departments.  18. To set high standards of integrity and quality and efficiency of work by example.  19. To prepare monthly reports.  20. To be responsible for health & safety of the department.  21. To inspect and ensure cleanliness of staff rooms.  22. To aid the Manager - Operations in monitoring and controlling security at the Store.  23. To help with sales promotions and to plan different strategies to make the promotion a successful one. 45. Is responsible for Store stock reconciliation and be accountable for stock in his/her departments. 46. To plan ways to prevent shrinkage and shoplifting.  24. In addition to this department/s on which the job holder concentrates, in case of exigencies of work  requirement, the services of the job holder would be utilized in other departments, stockroom, customer service desk, other Stores at the same location or any other location etc. also.  25. To carryout all other duties ancillary and incidental thereto as well as other duties assigned from time to time.

column2: MAIN PURPOSE OF THE JOB The studio Managers position is key to success at Advanced Hair Studio. The deployed person is responsible for the smooth functioning of all the aspects of the studio: starting from revenue assurance, to client service and all other A to Z functions related to the establishment. The KRAs for this position are: Revenue Generation, Team Management, Branding Marketing and Business Development Initiatives at the geography level and overall Operations of the studio. Role & responsibilities   ??Age should be 32+ and an experienced person ??To assure optimum performance and continual improvement in the five Key Result Areas (client service, team deliverables, sales/marketing, upkeep of the studio appearance, and profit/financial control) ??To demonstrate and promote a 100% commitment to providing the best possible experience for our clients by maintaining high standards set by the company. ??Ensure that client related issues are resolved in a manner consistent with the companys operating guidelines.? ??Responsible for maximizing revenues and achieving month on month targets.? ??Work closely with Business Development team to manage all sales activities of the studio and meet revenue objectives. ? ??To recruit qualified applicants, train and develop the team members in Technical, administrative and Managerial abilities ??Must motivate and mentor and give direction to the entire team.? ??Conduct regular trainings ??Communicate all policies and procedures to the entire team. ??Conduct regular meetings to provide various information including company communications, policy reviews and goals.? ??Perform duties & manage the entire studio operations whenever needed. ??Responsible for P & L of the Studio ??Achieving Customer delights through friendly and proficient service ??Regular inspections of all sections to ensure quality standards are maintained ??Develop and maintain a motivational working environment within the department ??Ensure associates are up to date with product knowledge.

column2: Role & responsibilities    Together with the store manager evaluate all store employees   Responsible for managing the store and the shift team, and ensure that the store provides  the highest level of customer service   Verify staff positioning during the shift according to the daily activity  Guarantee that the store is operated under the Dufry standards  Ensure that all products display the correct price and that all change of prices are  executed on time  Staff Briefing - Communicate to the staff the necessary information at the beginning of  the shift, including targeted sales, promotions, new products, company policies  Track the daily sales. Analyze if there is any issue in the store that might be affecting  the weekly sales  Supervise the stock counting at the end of the shift  Responsible for the opening and closing of the stores, together with the till supervisor ??Organize and coordinate shift plans  Perform the Product Knowledge/Training to the Shop Personnel  Review sales of last week / month by store, category and brand, compared to the  previous month, year and budget  Ensure that daily sales are being tracked by the shift supervisors and sales associates.  Analyze if any issue in the terminal / store might be affecting the weekly sales, and take  corrective actions if needed   Compile all customer complaints and suggestions and take action or escalate to the  relevant department   Responsible for managing the stores in the terminal within an operation, consistent with  the short and long term interests of the company  Identify any replenishment/promotions/pricing issues with the operation product  Manager and take the necessary action to correct them  Carry out all staff appraisal and evaluation - according to procedure  Review that all company policies have been executed by the staff.  Ensure store compliance with health and safety regulations  Undertake store administration duties such as managing store budgets and updating  financial record. Perks and Benefits   As per Industry Norms. Annual leaves, free AC Volvo Bus Pass for Travelling to Airport.

Motivating the sales team to meet sales objectives by training and mentoring staff. Creating business strategies to attract new customers, expand store traffic, and enhance profitability. column2: Manubhai Gems is looking for Floor Manager to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey        The floor manager is a critical position as it has a direct impact on the sales, conversion, customer experience, and sales team culture      As such, the incumbent plays a key role in managing and leading the sales team, handling floor operations and inventory, attending to the customer needs, and implementation of strategic initiatives              ROLE AND RESPONSIBILITIES:          Lead and manage the sales team; coaching and training them to improve their selling skills.          Manage floor operations and processes. Identify procedural roadblocks, and work with the management to iron out the same.          You wil be responsible to ensure that daily nangmel counting is cross-tallied with the system.      You will ensure that you do surprise audit of the nangmel, on monthly basis.      You will be responsible to do surprise audit, of randomised pieces, to cross tally physical BOM pieces and weight with that mentioned in the system.      You will be responsible to ensure peer audit is conducted on monthly basis.          Take charge of inventory management.          It will be your responsibility to check the stock for any QC issues with the product.      You will be responsible to train the sales team on proper handling of the jewellery pieces.      You will ensure that jewellery pieces are not kept in reserved boxes, or any other box, unnecessarily.      You will ensure that the stock is always arranged as per the weight range, and product type          Collaborate with the merchandising team, to ensure that right inventory is available at the right time. And, Fast Selling Designs (FSD) are always available in stock.      Ensure the sales floor is kept tidy and presentable.      Ensure that the customer is properly attended to, and are being treated well.      Nuturing and maintain relationship with the customers.      Manage customers and allocate mampower to various departments during periods of walk ins.      Represent the floor during MOS meetings, and team presentations.          CRITICAL COMPETENCIES          Excellent communication and relationship building skills.      Established organizational and leadership skills.      Should be a peoples person and have an engaging conversation style should be a great listener.      Action oriented and highly motivated.      Proficient in Excel and CRM/Database Management          QUALIFICATIONS AND EDUCATION REQUIREMENTS          Minimum 3 years of experience in direct sales.      Minimum of 3 year of experience in a management role - in retail industry.          PREFERRED SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE:          Should have worked in retail industry (luxury retail preferred) In a company that:          Sells products in the price range of 20k and above.      Is known for good customer experience.      Is known for good after sales service.          Should have the experience of running some kind of CRM program.          SUCCESS METRICS (SUBJECT TO REVIEW AND CHANGE AS NEEDED)          Improvement in the employee scorecard.      High employee satisfaction rating.      Achieving growth of 35% growth in DUO line of business      Reduce CSE process time without compromising on the control by 50%, of the current time. Prepare skill/will matrix for each team member, along with a future growth plan.      Imbibe leadership qualities in RSOs (immediate reportees)          CORE VALUES          Junoon for the Customers      Dangal Follow through results      Results Matter (over intent)      We Before Me          LEADERSHIP VALUES          Leaders eat last; arrive first, leave last.      Never throw your team members under the bus.      Everything under you is your responsibility.      Clear feedback, sound follow-up      Balance of accountability and empathy.
column11: relationship building, floor management, customer management, selling skills, inventory, matrix, retail, sales, excel, database management, jewellery, leadership, leadership skills, luxury sales, selling, inventory management, communication skills, crm, direct sales

column2: 1.Showroom Operations: Manage the day-to-day operations of the showroom, ensuring it is well-maintained, organized, and attractive to customers.      2.Customer Engagement: Provide excellent customer service by assisting customers in choosing the right products, addressing inquiries, and resolving any issues promptly.      3.Sales Targets: Set and achieve sales targets, monitor performance, and implement strategies to boost sales revenue.      4.Inventory Management: Oversee inventory levels, conduct regular stock checks, and coordinate with suppliers to maintain adequate stock levels.      5.Team Management: Lead and motivate the showroom staff, ensuring they are trained and equipped to deliver exceptional service.      Key Result Areas (KRAs):      1.Sales Performance: Achieve and exceed monthly and quarterly sales targets.      2.Customer Satisfaction: Maintain high levels of customer satisfaction through excellent service and problem resolution.      3.Showroom Efficiency: Ensure the efficient operation of the showroom, including inventory management and staff productivity.      4.Team Leadership: Develop a high-performing showroom team through training and coaching.      5.Visual Merchandising: Ensure the showroom is well-organized and visually appealing to attract and engage customers.      Key Performance Indicators (KPIs):      1.Monthly sales revenue      2.Customer satisfaction scores      3.Inventory turnover rate      4.Staff productivity and sales per staff member      5.Visual merchandising and showroom layout feedback

column2: Position :  Department Manager Industry :  QSR / FMCG / Hospitality / Entertainment / Manufacturing - Production Experience :  4-8 Years Education :  Intermediate / Any Graduate Location :  Across Telangana Job Description :  Is responsible for store opening/closing based on the shift. Conduct floor walk with purchase to ensure Hygiene, FIFO, timely refilling, proper display & correct price boards. Conduct Daily briefing for SA along with floor officer and for Cashier & Packers along with cash officer. Participate in weekly store meeting, weekly briefing for security staff, housekeeping staff and promoters. Track the daily KRAs for staff motivation & engagement. Guide the officer (floor, cash) for delegating task based on daily attendance of staff. Handle routine asset maintenance issues by coordinating with vendor, maintenance team. Supervise daily Perpetual Inventory and 10 item stock take. Ensure adherence to processes as per guidelines at receiving, on the floor and at the cash point to control pilferage. Monitor daily cash handover to bank  and follow strong room process at opening, closing. Check the SRT register and ensure process is followed. Handle customer complaints and queries. Supervise availability of Trollies, Baskets & bags for customer convenience and keep track of the trolley count on daily basis. Implement the suggestions of Process Audit & Fire Safety Audit by providing guidance to team. Assist ASM/SM to prepare a plan with timelines for stock take, delegate task, monitor & followup. Lead & actively participate in the Emergency Response Team, Fire Mock Drill (safety day). Coordinate with maintainence team for Dry Run of critical equipment. Conduct On the Job Training for Junior /Floor Officers, existing SAs. Ensure freshness, availability & visibility of Top Selling, Focus SKUs in non core, coordinate with category & execution for identifying slow/non moving SKUs, implement mark down, partial mark down, write off. Interested candidates kindly share your updated resume to  hrd.rotelangana@dmartindia.com

column2: Hi all  We are hiring Omni sport leader coach/department manager for a top retail company Omni Sport Leader Coach   Develop my local activity on my sports, and my teammates to keep customers/users satisfied in order to generate omnichannel performance RESPONSIBILITY 1 I plan, recruit and accompany teammates in their development  I anticipate human needs and recruit talents consistent with my commercial strategy and economic activity.  I accompany teammates development and autonomy by animating the managerial scheme - Individual Decision/Development Meeting(IDM) with teammates every 4 weeks - Validating teammates mission - Mid year evaluation and Annual Appraisal Meeting with teammates  Respect and enforce all staff legal rules. Reference:  Implement the best organization to support my customers and my effectiveness (who does what).  Lead and deliver the annual and weekly team schedule (Roster Management)  Develop collective intelligence (Team meetings, encourage decision making)  Celebrate victories, as well as failures that provide a learning experience.  Ensure effective integration of teammates with clear responsibilities (Onboarding, Induction of new teammates)  Facilitate the development of the skills of each teammate allowing them a good employability and sustain performance (IDMs every 4 weeks) RESPONSIBILITY 2 Grow local omnichannel performance in my sports  Build and lead my omnichannel commercial policy(Local sport project -LSP) of my sport in my catchment  Ensure that each teammate can guarantee an experience that captivates their customers: a satisfied or satisfied response across all channels.  Manage and achieve my commercial objectives and profitability for my omnichannel business (in store/outstore/digital) Reference:  Develop ambassador??teammates who understand, sell and promote our range of products and services.  Set up local and winning physical or digital partnerships that enable my sports(*) to grow.  Build and digitise my layouts mass plans adapted to each particular season for my sports  Regularly debrief and manage my activity in order to implement my commercial and financial decisions.  Forecast my instore/outstore commercial dynamism for the year, informed by the data. RESPONSIBILITY 3 Manage the store?? daily operations performance (daily manager)  Manage store security   Oversee teammates??availability   Manage product availability Reference:  Coordinate the availability of employees for the business.  Ensure customer satisfaction (waiting, checkout, etc.).  Manage incoming and outgoing product flows: reception, orders, etc.  Ensure store upkeep and safety (teammate, stock and customers) Interested can share resume to thanuja@delighthr.com
column11: Retail Operations, sport leader, departmental manager, Supervision

column2: Automotive Manufacturers Pvt. Ltd. is looking for Floor Manager to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey      Delegating responsibilities and supervising business operations      Hiring, training, motivating and coaching employees as they provide attentive, efficient service to customers, assessing employee performance and providing helpful feedback and training opportunities.      Resolving conflicts or complaints from customers and employees.      Monitoring store activity and ensuring it is properly provisioned and staffed.      Analyzing information and processes and developing more effective or efficient processes and strategies.      Establishing and achieving business and profit objectives.      Maintaining a clean, tidy business, ensuring that signage and displays are attractive.      Generating reports and presenting information to upper-level managers or other parties.      Ensuring staff members follow company policies and procedures.      Other duties to ensure the overall health and success of the business.
column11: Floor Manager

column2: Role & responsibilities   Developing store strategies to raise customers pool, expand store traffic and optimise  profitability Meeting sales goals by training, motivating, mentoring and providing feedback to store staff Ensuring high levels of customers satisfaction through excellent service Develop business strategies to raise our customer's pool, expand store traffic and optimise profitability Meet sales goals by training, motivating, mentoring and providing feedback to sales staff Ensure high levels of customers satisfaction through excellent service Complete store administration and ensure compliance with policies and procedures Maintain outstanding store condition and visual merchandising standards Report on buying trends, customer needs, profits, etc Propose innovative ideas to increase market share Conduct personnel performance appraisals to assess training needs and build career paths Deal with all issues that arise from staff or customers (complaints, grievances, etc) Be a shining example of good behaviour and high performance Additional store manager duties as needed Preferred candidate profile   Proven successful experience as a Floor Manager Powerful leading skills and business orientation Customer management skills Strong organisational skills Good communication and interpersonal skills   Perks and benefits   Best in the industry
column11: Floor Manager, Retail, Jewellery, Gold, Department Management, Gems, Jewelry, Department Manager, Store Incharge
